education.degree: Bachelor of Arts in Information Science

experience.title: Vice President
achievements: Automated event scheduling with Airtable, boosting coordination efficiency by 40%.
Directed marketing and recruitment campaigns, expanding membership from 27 to 270+ students.

projects.name: CURide – Community Ridesharing Platform

projects.name: Battleships (OCaml)
achievements: Implemented core engine with immutable game state and pure functions.

Property-based tests (QCheck) covering ship placement & shot resolution.

projects.name: NBA Shot Trends: Who Changed the Game?
achievements: Analyzed league-wide shot location densities (2000–2024), quantifying arc expansion and midrange decline.
Modeled player-level influence scores; identified eras where Curry/Harden tilted expected shot mix by >12%.
Built interactive explorer to compare shot charts and efficiency bands across seasons.
